file_content.text: Grrah! You are stubborn for soft thing. Stand still and die!
It's over, Vause.
Just give up.
This fight does not end until one of us dies!
I'm gonna have to decline.
Thanks, but no thanks.
You will not escape fate! It is your place to die!
I'm taking you down... hard.
The first thing I eat will be that mocking tongue!
Rahrr! It is my destiny to rise to godhead! I will not be stripped of my Jagganath by capture!
Screaming won't change anything. Let's go.
Not your choice. [Capture him]
Don't think losing ever crossed his mind... hard lesson.
He gambled with his life; he should have been prepared to lose.
Very hard.
What mind? He was a lunatic.
He was insane.
The pain's just starting for you, lizard.
You're a joke. [Capture him.]
Chiss can't do worse to him, after this.
That's their problem.
We're done here.
What do you mean?
You just zeroed his Jagganath, made him worthless. Nothing but oblivion waiting once the Chiss finally kill him.
When we meet our ends, hope we're more fortunate.
He's lucky I couldn't try.
Vause got off easy.
Had your fill of crazies yet, champ? I'm catching a chill.
Come on, I've got an eighty-proof idea of how to get warm.
Let's go find a drink.
That's the best news I've had all day.
Yeah, and?
Never mind, I'm suddenly warmed by your sunny disposition.
I'm a warrior first. Let's finish this right.
Die well. [Fight to the death]
That meant more than you know.
What do you mean?
Nothing worse than being taken alive to a Trando.
Jagganath gets wiped. Start from scratch, or die without an afterlife.
Not what he wanted, still did him a favor.
Yeah, I'm a big softy. I know.
I could tell.
You're not very good at this whole "following instructions" thing, are you?
I don't do anything just because somebody else wants me to.
I follow my own rules.
Neither did Vause. Might want to remember that in the future.
If I were, you'd be dead.
You shouldn't complain.
Touche.
Honor's an expensive habit you got there.
It's worth it, Gault. I don't expect you to get it.
Don't try to understand.
And I don't expect to convince you otherwise, so we'll call it even.
You're the one who's broke, remember?
Better than your habits.
Broke, but well-dressed.
I'm glad that's over. These White Maw guys are really giving me the creeps.
It's been a real freak show, that's for sure.
Ditto.
The White Maw's done for--all that's left is the dregs.
No one left to worry about.
Time to turn Vause over to the Chiss.
We're done here.
Hope that's the death you were looking for.
You are here! Good! Scorekeeper shall watch me eat beating heart from your chest.
Put up good fight, man-hunter, and I see you find fitting place in afterlife for feeding my destiny.
You haven't dealt with me yet, Vause.
Don't get ahead of yourself.
It is your place to fall under my blades.
What are you raving about now?
Your destiny?
What your destiny is gonna eat is my boot, lizard.
Careful what you wish for.
Hsst, yes! Show Scorekeeper you fight with some spine before I offer it to her!
Your death will serve greater purpose. None have ever or will ever reap more Jagganath than Reneget Vause!
When death finally claims me, Scorekeeper shall know this and take me as her mate. We shall be gods of hunt!
Are you here to fight or preach?
We're all here. Let's go.
Yes, we both crave blood. We fight!
This is a duel, not a brawl. I want a clean fight.
It's time to set ground rules.
Conditions will not change outcome. However you choose to fight, you will die.
Name your rules and be done. I thirst for your blood.
I want this to be a fair fight.
No tricks.
Your lackeys show up and all bets are off, got it?
I shall tear anyone who spoils my hunt limb from limb.
I'm the one you want. So, you kill me--you let them go.
We lose, my partner walks.
I'm the one you want. So, you kill me--you let her go.
We lose, my partner walks.
They are nothing to me. When you die, they may flee, but I shall tear anyone who spoils my hunt limb from limb.
That includes your pet if they are foolish enough to keep me from feasting on my kill.
Hey, don't look at me. Killer here dies, and I'll be looking for a new job.
You could at least pretend to sound concerned.
That's not nice.
I figure you're more likely to forgive me than he is.
You turn tail on me, and you'll be looking for a new leg.
Shut up, Gault.
Joke! It was a joke.
Try defiling one of my own, I'll skin you alive.
It's his way. If Vause wins, let him finish his rituals.
You're not skinning anything.
Okay, I don't like it.
Still thinks he's going to win.
Run and get a snack, the fun's about to start.
This should be quite a show.
I'll show him how loose the definition of a "live" bounty is.
Time for a wake up call.
No way, rot-breath! I can't let him do that to you.
I'd rather you get out of here alive, got it?
It's okay, Mako.
Uh, you really want to go through with this? I don't know if I can stop him alone if something happens.
It's time to finish this, Vause.
Enough, I'm ready to fight.
I go down, just bail.
Don't sweat it.
But--
Enough talk!
I will wait no longer to taste your flesh. Fight or die!
You think this overgrown snake's actually gonna kill me? Right....
Don't insult me, kid.
We lose, my partner walks.
I'm the one you want. So, you kill me--you let him go.
We lose, my partner walks.
Never mind, you're just gonna go berserk anyway.
Forget it, I'm wasting breath.
Then enough wasting time! Die!
Keep your mouth shut while we do this. I'm tired of hearing you gargle.
No more of your raving.
You really believe that?
I am done with your insults! I shall tear out your throat!
Your Jagganath is mine!
Now, offer beast to Scorekeeper. Show you are hunter worthy of her notice. Grrah! Not like that!
There! That is how you give praise to Scorekeeper, with blood on your teeth!
I hear you. Who lurks in darkness while we feast? Carrion-eaters are unwelcome here. Do not intrude on this hunt.
You're a wanted man, Vause. I'm here to take you in.
You're coming with me.
Hsst. Man-hunter, I will never know that shame. Not from the like of you or any other.
You're in no position to make demands, trust me.
I'm the one giving orders now.
It's not your hunt you should be worried about, snakeskin.
You've got bigger problems.
Hsst. This bounty hunter comes for my blood. She shall leave disappointed.
Hsst. This bounty hunter comes for my blood. He shall leave disappointed.
I have torn eyes from Wookiee chieftains with bare claws alone, feasted on krayt dragon flesh, crushed armadas!
I do not debase my Jagganath by swatting yapping dogs.
It's a bad idea to underestimate me.
Just come peacefully.
You wouldn't be the first "unstoppable" target I've taken down.
I've handled your type before.
You need more than tough talk to impress Scorekeeper.
That supposed to scare me?
Taunts are of no value to Scorekeeper.
You are nothing to me, soft thing hiding in hard shell. Unknown, untested, unworthy. Bigger prey awaits me.
This man-hunter has spirit, boost your young blood scores nicely. I leave her to you. Paint your glories in her blood!
This man-hunter has spirit, boost your young blood scores nicely. I leave him to you. Paint your glories in his blood!
This hunt is ours. Go.
Bleed soft-thing! Bleed and die!
No matter how bad things get, don't interfere.
So don't get in my way.
That means no shooting him in the back.
You know the rules. Just watch and learn.
We lose, my partner walks.
